PageWidgetPortable.Title: Documentos >> documentos de pagamento
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>PORTAL_CLI_FINANCEIRO_DOCUMENTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <DefaultFilterName>Em aberto</DefaultFilterName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>20</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.ABRANGENCIA IN('N','T') AND A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'S' AND A.EHPREVISAO = 'N' AND A.PESSOA IN (SELECT B.PESSOA FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS B WHERE B.HANDLE = @USUARIO) AND A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA AND OPERACAOCANCELAMENTO IS NULL</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalCliente/e/Financeiro/Documento.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
